connectorKey.title: Connector Key
connectorKey.description: Key obtained from the Connector app. Go to Profile > About and tap the screen five times.

hubIp.title: Connector Hub IP
hubIp.description: IP of the Connector hub device. Fill this in if UDP multicast discovery is not working.

enableDebug.title: Debug Logging
enableDebug.description: Enables verbose logging of plugin events.
